00025 class Database;
00026 
00034 class Statement
00035 {
00036 public:
00037         ~Statement();
00038 
00044         template<typename T>
00045                 void Bind(int col, const T &value);
00046 
00051         template<typename T>
00052         T Column(int col);
00053 
00054 
00059         int Step();
00060 
00061 
00069         int InsertStep();
00070 
00074         void Reset();
00075 
00076         sqlite3_stmt *getSQLiteStatement() { return _stmt; }
00077 protected:
00078         Statement(sqlite3_stmt *stmt)
00079                 : _stmt(stmt) {}
00080     sqlite3_stmt *_stmt;
00081 
00082         friend class Database;
00083 };
00084 
00085 inline int Statement::InsertStep()
00086 {
00087     if(Step() != SQLITE_DONE)
00088         throw std::runtime_error("Statment::Step did not return SQLITE_DONE.\n"
00089                 "This might be caused be a failed insert statement to the database.");
00090 }
00091 
00092 }}
